value.title: Self-driving robot delivery startup raises $4.2 million to expand in Ann Arbor
value.excerpt: Ann Arbor-based delivery robot developer Refraction AI has raised $4.2 million in seed funding. The company in 2019 created the REV-1 robot, a lightweight, self-driving robot that delivers food and groceries to Ann Arbor residents.
